name: Ziprent
address: 4600 E Washington St suite 300, Phoenix, AZ 85034
description: In Phoenix, Ziprent combines automation with hands-on expertise to offer standout property management and tenant placement, helping landlords increase rental income through clear flat fee pricing and consistently praised 5-star support. Ziprent is transforming the rental experience for Phoenix property owners with a forward thinking, full-service approach to provide thebest property managementand tenant placement services. Their process includes marketing and advertising listings with professional photography through their broad listing syndication across top platforms like Zillow, Apartments, and Redfin, along with their automated on-demand showing process that uses secure smart lockboxes and thorough tenant screening to find the most qualified renters for their landlords. After finding the ideal tenant, Ziprent manages everything from handling rent processing and collection, generating and handling lease renewals, and providing support for both landlords and tenants via phone and email. With clear flat fee pricing, no percentage based commissions, and a strong satisfaction guarantee, Ziprent offers Phoenix landlords a dependable, streamlined way to keep their properties running smoothly.
tenant_placement_fee: $1,250 paid after tenant is placed
miscellaneous_fees: $250 photography fee for first time landlords

name: Caldwell Property Management
address: 1206 E Warner Rd Ste 214, Gilbert, AZ 85296
description: Caldwell Property Management serves residential clients throughout Phoenix and the surrounding areas, providing real estate brokerage and property management services. Caldwell helps investors to identify the Phoenix property investment that allows you to meet your goals, starting with a market analysis to find unique investment opportunities and assist with the purchase process. They also work with existing property owners to help you maximize your return on investment through their full-service property management that handles everything from advertising to evictions. To ensure you get the most out of your investment, they perform a free rental analysis that utilizes current market conditions to identify the right price point for your property to attract tenants while maximizing profits. Once your property is ready to be leased, Caldwell markets your vacancy, schedules and conducts showings, screens potential tenants for a variety of background information, and drafts the lease in compliance with Arizona Landlord-Tenant laws. As part of their daily management services, they also handle rent collection, lease renewals and evictions, tenant communication, maintenance and inspections, and monthly financial reporting that keeps you informed on your investment’s performance.
tenant_placement_fee: 1 month’s rent for tenant placement only

name: Simply Property Management
address: 15650 N Black Canyon Hwy Ste 115B, Phoenix, AZ 85053-4057
description: Simply Property Management, also known as Paielli Realty, provides residential management and even property buying services to Phoenix. Simply Property Management, also known as Paielli Realty, provides residential management and even property buying services to Phoenix. They offer exceptional local experience of 30+ years, helping to market the property to local tenants and earn more rent for owners. They offer multiple tiers of services spanning from background checks only to tenant placement, or management services that include placement, maintenance, rent collection, eviction management, and more. There is also a 30-day guarantee on their services, so you can give them a try before you commit your property to them.
management_fee: 7-10% of monthly rent (min. $95/month), plus $30-50 depending on plan
tenant_placement_fee: 1 month’s rent ($800 min.) for tenant placement only
lease_renewal_fee: Simply Property Management – $120 – $140, depending on plan
miscellaneous_fees: $85 – $120 property evaluation fee (depending on plan), $99 set-up fee with some plans, $99 – $499 marketing fee (depending on plan), $350 eviction services fee

name: Red Hawk Property Management
address: 2451 E. Baseline Rd, Suite 410, Gilbert, AZ 85234
description: Red Hawk Property Management is a smaller-scale residential management company that offers affordability and individual touch to Phoenix landlords. Red Hawk is dedicated to making your job as a landlord easier. Their comprehensive services allow them to take over the entirety of the leasing process (except the profits) on your behalf through efficient communication, decades of knowledge, and quality customer service. Their services begin with property and market evaluations to lock in the right price for listing. They use a MLS service as well as online listing sites to get your property in front of as many potential renters as possible, who are then screened diligently so that you only see the best. When a tenant is chosen, the lease, security deposit, and all rent & maintenance is handled for you. Simply collect and review financial documentation as you earn rental income.
management_fee: $89/month, but only when unit is occupied
tenant_placement_fee: 50% of one month’s rent
lease_renewal_fee: $75, only charged on leases one year in length or longer
miscellaneous_fees: One inspection is provided free, optional additional inspections cost $75

name: AZ Prime Property and Real Estate Management
address: 3920 S. Rural Rd, Suite #110, Tempe, AZ 85282
description: AZ Prime Property and Real Estate Management offers full-service rental property management and real estate services to Phoenix and the surrounding areas. AZ Prime handles all aspects of the rental property process, including brokerage, tenant placement, and daily management. During the lease term, they take care of all communication, bill payment, rent collection, maintenance, and legal proceedings while you’ll receive regular financial reports through the owner portal to help you stay up-to-date on how your investment is performing.
management_fee: 10% of collected rents; for 3 or more units, the fee is 8%
tenant_placement_fee: 6% of total lease

name: Mynd Management
address: 58 S River Dr. Ste 150, Tempe, AZ 85281

name: Taylor Street Property Management
address: 2929 E Camelback Rd, Ste 219, Phoenix, AZ 85016
description: Taylor Street Property Management is a residential-only property management company working with owners throughout Greater Phoenix. Taylor Street emphasizes maximizing your profitability by protecting your investment and increasing your income. They handle all aspects of property management process so you don’t have to, starting with a free rental analysis that outlines expected income potential so that you can decide whether renting your property is the right choice for you. Their tenant placement includes all necessary steps to find a high-quality tenant in as little time as possible, utilizing extensive marketing and in-depth screenings to ensure anyone trusted with your property is reliable. Custom leasing and security deposit management are also included to ensure things start off on the right foot with full legal compliance assurance for you. Taylor Street’s daily management includes all maintenance, financial, and legal needs of the tenancy, including collecting the rent, coordinating maintenance, enforcing the lease, providing accounting for the property, and more.

name: Bennett Property Management, Inc.
description: Bennett Property Management owns more than 50 years of experience serving property owners in the Greater Phoenix area. Bennett PM specializes in residential property management for all kinds of properties, providing full-service solutions spanning both leasing and daily management services so that you don’t need to overextend yourself. Their team will begin by providing you with a rental analysis of your property to outline expected earnings, make recommendations for improvements to increase your earnings, and help you get the property ready for the rental market quickly so that you can minimize vacancy periods for maximum profitability. Bennett’s leasing takes care of creating a listing, marketing it through local & online rental resources, showing the property to potential applicants as needed, screening for information like criminal or rental history, verifying income, and drafting a custom lease with full legal compliance for your peace of mind. During the lease, Bennett PM assumes the role of the landlord, allowing you to be hands-off throughout the process while they address maintenance, collect rent, answer calls, and address lease issues as they arise to maintain reliable cash flow.

name: Guardian Realty & Management Inc
description: Guardian Realty & Management offers residential real estate and property management to the Greater Phoenix area, backed by over 40 years of local market experience. Guardian provides full-service management and investor services that span the entirety of the rental process, including buying a rental property, preparing it for leasing, and filling the vacancy for you. Their goal is to help you increase the value of your investment and protect your property so that you can enjoy maximum profitability with minimal time investment, stress, or responsibility. Whether you currently own a property or are looking to add a rental property to your portfolio, Guardian provides free market and rental analyses to help you budget effectively and set expectations for income, expenses, and long-term profitability. Services available include buying assistance, leasing services that find you a high-quality tenant quickly thanks to extensive marketing and rigorous tenant screening, and daily management that handles all the needs of your tenant and property. This includes rent collection, upkeep, maintenance, communication & emergency concierge, lease enforcement & renewals, and financial summaries each month to keep you up-to-date.

name: HomeRiver Group® Phoenix
address: 3337 N. Miller Rd, Suite 105, Phoenix, AZ 85251
description: HomeRiver Group Phoenix offers residential property management services to the Greater Phoenix area. HomeRiver Group Phoenix helps you to achieve a steady profit with your rental property investment with as little stress or time investment as possible. They use their local experience paired with the tools and information provided by their national brand HomeRiver to offer advanced insight, accurate pricing information, modern tools, and up-to-date strategies that help you keep costs down and income high. A rental analysis is available for free to help you decide whether to lease your property, which helps to prepare you for their tenant placement services which find you a tenant through extensive marketing, in-depth screening, and custom leasing. HomeRiver Group Phoenix emphasizes protecting your property with their management plans, ensuring to conduct preventative maintenance and inspections regularly to avoid major problems from arising so that you can avoid surprise expenses. They also utilize an online tenant portal where rent is collected, maintenance can be requested, and all communication can be done at any time for faster response times. You’ll receive your own portal as well, providing monthly financial summaries, annual tax information, and reports on any inspections or maintenance completed so that you can track your profitability at any time.

name: Impero Property Management LLC
description: Impero Property Management has more than a decade of residential property management and real estate experience in the Greater Phoenix Valley. Impero is a highly-rated property and real estate management company who works with investors and owners of residential properties, helping to achieve hands-off rental income for you so that you can spend your time how you want to. If you’re looking to get involved in the Phoenix market, their real estate team can help you identify investment opportunities, create plans & budgets, and acquire the property through real estate brokerage services. Existing property owners are also entitled to a rental analysis where they appraise your property’s earning potential, find ways to increase your rental income, and transition the property so that it is rent-ready as soon as possible. For vacant properties, Impero takes over finding a tenant and beginning the tenancy for you with marketing, showings, screening, and leasing services that ensure a trustworthy tenant is placed so that you can rest easy knowing your investment is in good hands. If any problems arise during the lease term, Impero’s 24/7 emergency support handles them quickly and effectively to help avoid costly disasters while providing peace of mind to your tenants. Additionally, all daily needs of the property and tenant are addressed, including timely rent collection and maintenance handling through the 24/7 tenant portal, lease management, evictions, and accounting that makes it easy to stay informed without being involved.

name: Beehive Property Management
description: Beehive Property Management is a full-service property management company offering residential management solutions to Phoenix property owners and investors. Beehive PM works to make it easy to get started earning passive rental income, whether you’re an experienced investor or just getting started. Offering a full suite of management services, their team strives to help you minimize your vacancy and maximize your income. Their licensed professionals hold multiple decades of combined Phoenix property management experience, giving them the knowledge, insight, and skills necessary to help your investment thrive and ensure you achieve the highest possible ROI. They pride themselves on staying ahead of the competition through continued education, effective communication, and their use of the latest technology, keeping investors and property owners informed on the status of your investment around the clock. To ensure you’re protected from costly penalties and fines, they also stay up-to-date on all laws and regulations pertaining to your rights as a landlord. When you choose Beehive PM for your management needs, you can have peace of mind knowing your investment is in the hands of professionals who will always put your best interests first.

name: PMI Real Estate Services
address: 7717 W Deer Valley Rd Ste 120, Peoria, AZ 85382
description: PMI Real Estate Services is a real estate brokerage and property management company in Phoenix providing services for properties and communities of all types. PMI Real Estate Services utilizes state-of-the-art technology and innovative strategies backed by over 20 years of industry experience to provide exceptional realty and management services to property owners, investors, and community managers throughout Phoenix. As part of the nationwide PMI brand, they are committed to enhancing, improving, and adding value to all properties and communities under their management through effective communication, transparency, integrity, 24/7 availability, and accurate accounting. If any tenant they place needs to be evicted for any reason, not only will they handle all legal fees up to $2,000, but they’ll also replace the tenant at no additional cost to you if their lease is broken within the first 9 months of the lease term. Additionally, you won’t have to pay until they get you results, and if you’re unhappy with their services, you can terminate your management agreement penalty-free so long as you provide 30 days’ notice.

name: Evernest
description: Evernest is a residential property management company that works with single-family and smaller multi-unit properties throughout Birmingham. Evernest offers full-service property management that focuses on making it stress-free to lease your property and begin earning rental income by handling all aspects of being a landlord. They provide a free rental analysis of your property that helps to properly market your property so that you can attract the right tenants while maximizing your profit. Marketing is conducted through MLS and major rental sites with professional photography that helps the property to sell. As part of their tenant placement services, they guarantee that they’ll fill your property’s vacancy within 21 days, or your first 2 months of fees are waived and if the tenant needs to be evicted within a year, they’ll replace them for free. They also guarantee all maintenance for 1 year and guarantee you’ll be happy with their services, but if you aren’t you can cancel at any time without fees.
management_fee: $89 – $179 per month depending on plan or 8% monthly for 5+ properties
tenant_placement_fee: one month’s rent with the investor and gold plans
lease_renewal_fee: $299 with the investor and gold plans
miscellaneous_fees: $149 annual inspection with the investor and gold plans

name: Specialized Property Management
address: 2320 Highland Ave S Ste 290D, Birmingham, AL 35205
description: Specialized Property Management works exclusively with residential properties throughout Birmingham with nearly 4 decades of experience. SPM takes a high-tech and communication-focused approach to full-service residential property management. They use the tool Rental-iQ to provide them with advanced insight into market trends and you with up-to-date information relating to maintenance and financial summaries that are always accessible to you.They have a 24/7 concierge service that answers calls live with a real person to help solve problems as quickly as possible, including maintenance calls which are immediately available to be conducted by a licensed contractor so that you can keep your tenants happy. Their services include marketing, tenant placement, rent collection, maintenance, and eviction processing with each plan including accounting services as well to help make tax season simpler.
tenant_placement_fee: 60 – 100%, depending on plan
miscellaneous_fees: $395 virtual tour with the standard plan

name: Signal Property Management
description: Signal Property Management offers residential property management to property owners in Birmingham and the surrounding areas. Signal knows firsthand how frustrating managing your property on your own can be, which is why they offer full-service property management that handles all of your daily needs, allowing you to get back to enjoying life while they generate passive income from your investment. They utilize the latest technology to streamline the management process and communicate with tenants and owners alike to keep you informed. Digital and traditional advertising ensure your property gets in front of as many potential tenants as possible, and applicants are screened for multiple points of background information before approval so you can have peace of mind knowing your property is in respectful, qualified hands. Throughout the lease term, Signal handles rent collection and disbursement, bill payment, legal guidance, frequent inspections, regular and emergency maintenance coordination, income and expense reporting, lease renewals, and evictions.
tenant_placement_fee: 100% of one month’s rent or the greater of 50% of one month’s rent or $500, depending on plan

name: Mega Agent Rental Management
description: Mega Agent Rental Management is a residential property management and HOA management company serving the Greater Birmingham area. Mega Agent specializes in multi-family residential properties and condo association management that provides comprehensive and cost-effective solutions that add value to your investment. Their full-service property management includes tenant placement services, rent collection, maintenance, evictions, and accounting so that you can sit back and relax while you earn your rental income. Their association management helps you to more easily manage your community through administrative assistance, accounting services, budgeting & planning assistance, common area maintenance, landscaping, staffing, and service to individual units that allows tenants to access an online portal to request maintenance or pay their bills. Both plans include free consultation and evaluation of your property or community as well so it’s easy to get started.
tenant_placement_fee: one month’s rent

name: Divine Approach Real Estate and Property Management Firm, LLC
description: Divine Approach provides comprehensive property management and real estate services that include full-service management to residential and commercial properties as well as HOAs and communities. Divine Approach provides services for all aspects of the rental property process from start to finish. Their real estate division can help to identify unique rental property options to purchase that will provide a high ROI for your investment while their property management services prepare it for leasing, market the property, screen tenants, and draft the lease for the tenancy. During tenancy, they answer maintenance calls, provide upkeep, collect rent, and more for individual properties with community services including common area maintenance, bookkeeping, community building, and administrative work. Financial summaries are provided monthly alongside inspection reports and other updates being provided through the owner portal which is accessible 24/7.
management_fee: 10% of one month’s rent or $70, whichever is greater
tenant_placement_fee: 100% of first full month’s rent
miscellaneous_fees: $275 screening and leasing fee, $125/unit occupied property on-boarding fee

name: Real Property Management Victory
description: Real Property Management Victory is a management company that works with both residential and commercial properties in Birmingham. RPM Victory can take a wide range of properties and get them ready to be leased for top-dollar. They offer a free rental analysis and advice on what should be done to get it rent-ready or increase the value of the property. They utilize a number of tools to find comparable rentals and analyze the market which helps them to identify the right price to list for so that you maximize income while reaching the right type of tenant. All applicants are screened for criminal and rental history to help avoid damage during tenancy with income verification that ensures you receive your rent each month from reliable tenants. During the lease, they take over all day-to-day management like rent collection and maintenance while conducting regular inspections that aim to catch problems before they get worse.
tenant_placement_fee: 75% of one month’s rent with a management plan or 100% of one month’s rent (min. $1,000) for tenant placement only
miscellaneous_fees: $199 property setup and marketing fee for tenant placement only plan

name: 1st Choice Properties
address: 100 Century Park South Suite 104, Birmingham, AL +35226
description: 1st Choice Properties provides full-service residential and commercial property management and real estate services to clients throughout Birmingham and the surrounding areas. 1st Choice Properties operates as a brokerage also offering full-service property management, making them a one-stop shop for all of your real estate investment needs. They were originally formed to work alongside Alliance Wealth Builders, Inc. (AWB), a real estate investment firm in the area. Because of their partnership, for any properties purchased through AWB, they don’t charge any first-time leasing fees. 1st Choice strives to help investors and property owners achieve and maintain wealth through the passive rental income generated from your rental property, and they’ll handle all daily operations required to keep it profitable. Not only will they use their expertise to provide quality management services, but they also provide resources for property owners to keep you informed at all times.
tenant_placement_fee: 100% of one month’s rent

name: Renters Warehouse Birmingham
description: Renters Warehouse Birmingham is the local branch of national chain Renters Warehouse, providing residential property management and real estate services to the Greater Birmingham area. These management services include collecting rent, performing maintenance, paying bills, paying you, and handling evictions if necessary. Financial accounting is also included with monthly reports that keep you informed.
miscellaneous_fees: $99 account set-up fee, $199 if with existing tenants, $199 eviction admin fee

name: Birmingham Home Leasing
address: 4000 Eagle Point Corporate Dr Ste 240, Birmingham, AL 35242
description: Birmingham Home Leasing serves owners and investors of $1500+ per month residential rental properties throughout the Birmingham Metro area. Daily management with Birmingham Home Leasing includes maintenance and inspections, rent collection, bill payment and accounting, tenant communication, lease renewals, evictions, and more.
management_fee: 2.5 – 5% of rental rate, or 7.5% of rental rate for 15+ properties
tenant_placement_fee: 50 – 100% of first month’s rent, depending on rental amount

name: Decas Group
address: 490 Wildwood Cir N Ste 170, Birmingham, AL 35209

name: Freedom Ventures Property Management
description: Freedom Ventures Property Management serves residential property owners and investors throughout Birmingham and the surrounding areas. address: 100 Chase Park South Suite 216, Hoover, AL 35244

tenant_placement_fee: 50% of one month’s rent

description: Watts Realty Company is one of the longest-standing property management and real estate companies in all of Birmingham, boasting more than 115 years in business. name: Gateway Management Company

name: Best Property Managers in Nearby Cities
